about_the_game:
1-3 Player Co-op

  • Play solo or team up with one or two friends. Progression is shared across all players equally. However, all loot and items are only yours to find and keep...

    Responsive Top-Down Shooting

  • Encounter and fight possessed creatures and corrupted bodies that walk the land in search of any remaining life to consume. Some life though, remains in a constant state of resistance. When the time comes, it will be your choice whether to release it.

    Loot, Craft and Upgrade Weapons and Armour

  • Delve through untouched containers to find essential ingredients. Use these to craft new gun mods and armour upgrades to ensure your survival. Or, sell them to any merchant you encounter for healing consumables.

    Unique Respawn System

  • Death is not the end. After you face your inevitable fate, your soul will hunt for new vessels of life, these will bring you back to continue your journey.

    Storytelling and Collectables

  • Complete small puzzles and defeat relentless bosses to discover pieces of the past. Lost tapes, notes and objects that all uncover the world before that once existed.

    Character Customization

  • Use your personal vehicle when deciding to travel to a new location. Your vehicle also provides the ability to customize the appearance of it and your character.

    Procedurally Generated Levels

  • This post-apocalyptic world is full of memorable locations that will have you lost in its chaotic and surreal atmosphere.

name: Shale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 7th gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Discover the abandoned world of Shale in this 1-3 player action adventure. Shoot, craft and loot through cities of possessed creatures, industrial parks of corrupted bodies and fields of forgotten souls.
